sys_ui_message.key: to enquire about your sick leave pay, do the following: 1. access your people portal ﻿2. select **log a case** > **payroll** > **payment request** ﻿3. complete the mandatory fields and then click on **submit**
sys_ui_message.message: To enquire about your sick leave pay, do the following: 1. Access your People Portal ﻿2. Select **Log a Case** > **Payroll** > **Payment Request** ﻿3. Complete the mandatory fields and then click on **Submit**
sys_ui_message.sys_name: to enquire about your sick leave pay, do the following: 1. access your people portal ﻿2. select **log a case** > **payroll** > **payment request** ﻿3. complete the mandatory fields and then click on **submit**
